articles.title: API Gateway Patterns
articles.content: API gateways provide a single entry point for your microservices. Learn about routing, load balancing, and request transformation.

articles.title: Caching Strategies for APIs
articles.content: Effective caching can dramatically improve API performance. Explore different caching strategies and when to use them.

articles.title: Webhook Implementation Guide
articles.content: Webhooks enable real-time communication between services. Learn how to implement secure and reliable webhooks.

articles.title: API Authentication Methods
articles.content: Compare different authentication methods including API keys, OAuth 2.0, JWT tokens, and their use cases.

articles.title: API Monitoring and Observability
articles.content: Monitor your API's health, performance, and usage with proper logging, metrics, and tracing.
